channel.title: Neovim tips on Learn Shortcuts
channel.description: Recent content in Neovim tips on Learn Shortcuts

item.title: Week 0
item.description: Starting point # This is a short chapter to describe starting point. Before starting you should have: basic experience with neovim (I had ~5 months as neovim as my main editor but also less is sufficient for sure) know basic movement, editing and similar in vim. know very basics of lua (for config) Some random tips # Make neovim your default editor # .zshenv export EDITOR="nvim" Add alias to launch neovim faster
